Class CartControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.server.controllers.AbstractController
io.fusion.air.microservice.adapters.controllers.open.CartControllerImpl
@CrossOrigin @Configuration @Validated @RestController @RequestMapping("${service.api.path}/cart") @RequestScope public class CartControllerImpl extends AbstractController
Cart Controller for the Cart Service This is to demonstrate certain concepts in Exception Handling ONLY. Order, Product, Cart all must be part of 3 different Microservices.
Version:
1.0
Author:
arafkarsh
